Text:
big thanks....

:)
any chance of releasing season 1?
Season 01 => http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3355385

Is there something wrong with this file? I tried to play the first two episodes (those already finished downloading) with every player I have on this computer (VLC, DivX, W. Mediaplayer, BS) and they won't play. At all!
GSpot even says the file's not a valid avi file!! 

Or will the episodes only play when I've finished downloading every single episode? 

Anyone else has this problem?

Hello greet

I checked all files with GSpot V2.21 and they're ok! Codec is Xvid. I use ZoomPlayer (http://www.inmatrix.com/files/zoomplayer_download.shtml) to watch the files.

Thanks zonesch, but I downloaded that zoomplayer you suggested and it's not working either. It says: 
"Error. Unable to play [Felicity 2x01 Sophomoric.avi] This may be due to a corrupt file, missing filters, filter conflicts or hardware related issues."
When I tried to play the second one, I didn't get a message like this, I just got a blank screen and on the bottom it said the episode is around 2 minutes long.
That's another thing, when I look at the details of the files, there are no minutes/seconds under the lenght-part of the videofile. That's just blank.

I don't get it! I don't understand why it won't work.
I guess the d/l is not over yet...
Hi greet. Have you installed the codec for Xvid? => http://www.inmatrix.com/zplayer/formats/xvid.shtml
Yes, I have that ...
I use VLC and the first episode works just fine :) At first there was no pic, but then I just fullscreened it and voila...  it worked.

I re-downloaded the second episode through BitComet (because I can select just 1 episode though that program) and it clearly says it has downloaded the full 100% and the episode just won't play!!! I have never had a problem like this before - I've downloaded plenty of avi files and they always work perfectly on this computer! :(

Meh. This sucks! I've been searching for these episodes for so long! (I would buy the DVD but they're not released over here.)

Well, thank you kaptenkongo!! I'm not the only one having problems (sucks for you too of course)!! I doubt it's a problem with BitComet though, I used Bittornado at first and it didn't work after downloading with that either.
At first I too thought that it was just a matter of having to download all the episodes or something, but I asked around and it seems like no one I know ever had to do that when downloading a full season ... I don' know what to do/try anymore ...

I downloaded the latest codec pack from http://www.codecpack.com/ and I used my VLC player and everything worked fine (both season 1 and 2) - also GSpot has no problem rendering the files.
As for kaptenkongo's question, I watched the 2nd and 3rd episodes of both seasons before I downloaded the complete seasons.
I'm sorry it doesn't work for you guys, but the encoding seems to be ok...
Third Season => http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3363908

zonesch - thank you for taking the time to put up those MD5 sums! I am now 100% sure it's the files and not my computer/player/codec. Which makes me more confused as I do not understand why the files are corrupted for me when they work fine for others! *puzzled*

Ooooh. s3! But I can't start downloading that one if I don't know what went wrong with the 2nd. 

Anyone got any suggestions?

jeremypj - where are you from? The Netherlands or Belgium? I wouldn't count on finding Dutch subtitles though! There never are Dutch ones around and it's already an older show + DVDs not out. Can you play the episodes? Do they work for you?
thx
Hi Greet, I'm from the Netherlands. The files are excellent. No problems with playing them. Only Ulead Movie Factory and Pinnacle can't handle the files. Thank you for the good work done!!!

Jeremypj - would it be too much to ask for if you'd put the episodes on discs and send them to me? I'd pay for the dvds & stamps of course. Or send you blank DVDs. I'd just really, really like to watch more of Felicity. Mail me at justwantedto @ gmail.com if you'd want to help me out. Please? I'm from Belgium btw.
anybody please seed this.thanks.
Does anybody has Season 3?

Hey, first of all, thanks for this. I haven't download it yet, but am going to...

Just wondering if there was one for Season 1?
hey thanks for the download, any word on season 1 and 3? I cant find them anywhere...
Great upload!! Thx!!
yey, really wanna see this. but seed pleaaase! thx!
hello! do you have felicity season 1 and 3 too?
I've completely downloaded season 2. The video is fine (it's clear) but THERE IS NO AUDIO. Please help on how I can play it with sound. Thanks so much!
thank you
